name: VM汉化组infernal origins Mod汉化包

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Need a new task? I've got a job for you.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 想要一个新任务？我正好有一份任务给你。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> New threats have been spotted, I need you to wipe them out.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 发现新的敌人，我需要你消灭它们。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> You know the drill. Kill them until the job is done.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 你知道该怎么做，击杀它们直到任务完成。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Fresh blood's been scented. Get it done.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 鲜血散发着香味，快干掉它。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> I've got a new task for you. Good luck.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 我有一个新任务要给你，祝你好运。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> What do you want? You've got a job to do.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 你还想要什么？你的任务还没完成呢。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Stop bothering me. Get to the task.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 别再烦我了，快去做任务。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> You're not getting another task until you finish this one.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 你不能开始新任务，除非你完成当前任务。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> Complete your mission, then come back to me.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 完成你的任务之后再回来找我。

pairs.key: §f<Slayer Master> I'm not going to give you another task until this one is done. Get to it.
pairs.value: §f<资深杀手> 我不想给你新任务，除非你完成当前任务，快去做。

pairs.key: §eYou've completed your slayer task and have been awarded
pairs.value: §e你完成了杀手任务并且获得

pairs.key: §ePress Z to access the slayer and skill menu.
pairs.value: §e按Z键进入杀手任务界面和技能界面。

pairs.key: §cYou don't have a Slayer Task, Press Z!
Your Slayer Task and Task Streak have been reset.
pairs.value: 你的杀手任务和任务连胜已被重置。

pairs.key: §cYou've canceled your slayer task. Your task streak has been reset.
pairs.value: §c你已放弃杀手任务，任务连胜已被重置。

pairs.key: §cYou cannot cancel your task unless you tick the checkbox.
pairs.value: §c勾选该复选框后可以放弃此任务。

pairs.key: §cYou currently do not have a slayer task assigned.

pairs.value: §c<凋灵> 我们一直在注视着。
§c<凋灵> 你的末日即将来临。
§c<凋灵> 困于永恒的地狱中吧。
§c<凋灵> 你的曲折命运永远不会改变。
§c<凋灵> 失败是命中注定的。
§c<凋灵> 体会一下我的痛苦吧。
§c<凋灵> 我们的惩戒随之而来。

pairs.key: §4The Wither is charging up! Prepare to block!
pairs.value: §4凋灵正在暴走！准备好对抗它！
§c<凋灵> 死亡是不可避免的。
§c<凋灵> 你的腐坏就是我的养料。

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> My domain will not be challenged!
pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 我的领域不会受到挑战！

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> My domain will not be challenged!
pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 我的领域不会受到挑战！
§c<远古守卫者> 淹没在我的力量中吧！

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> The waves will crush you!
pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 海浪会将你拍碎！
§c<远古守卫者> 仆从们，保护我！
§c<远古守卫者> 保护你们的王！

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> I will not die like this!
pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 我不会就这样死去！

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> I was promised to rule!
pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 我一直都统治着这里！
§c<远古守卫者> 信标！快治愈我！
§c<远古守卫者> 信标！我需要治疗！
§c<远古守卫者> 信标！治愈你的王！

pairs.key: §4Kill the Elder Guardian's summoned beacon before it heals!
pairs.value: §4在远古守卫者召唤信标治愈它之前击杀它！
§c<远古守卫者> 自残吧，渣滓！
§c<远古守卫者> 放开你的王！

pairs.key: §c<Elder Guardian> Die to your own blade!
pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 死于你自己的刀下吧！
§c<远古守卫者> 你的心脏即将过载！

pairs.key: §4Get away from your friends, you're about to overcharge!

pairs.value: §c<远古守卫者> 虚空的低语……

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Hear me from the shadows...
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 在暗影中聆听我的声音……
§c<末影守卫> 他在看着我们……

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Every move we make they see...
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 他能看到的我们的每个动作……
§c<末影守卫> 我们无法逃避……

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> You will not know their pain...
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 你不会知道他们有多痛苦……
§c<末影守卫> 他们一直在被折磨着……

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Not even I could help them...
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 但就连我也无能为力……

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Let your sins be cleansed.
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 除去你的罪恶吧。

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Purge yourself from your sins.
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 净化你自己，除去你的罪恶吧。
§c<末影守卫> 命运会将你净化的。
§c<末影守卫> 你的阴暗面会逐渐显露出来。

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> The shadows come for revenge.
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 它们为了复仇而来。
§c<末影守卫> 它们来自虚空。

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Each of you... colors in this blank void?
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 你们每个人……都给这片空白的虚空染了色吗？

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Curious, your souls are different...
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 很奇怪，你们的灵魂都不相同……

pairs.key: §c<Ender Guardian> Beautiful colors... I've missed them so...
pairs.value: §c<末影守卫> 多美丽的颜色啊……我想起它们了，所以……

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Fall t' the throne o' ice!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 坠死在冰之王座上吧！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye dare attack the cap'n o' winter's bane!?
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 你竟然胆敢攻击冬之灾厄的船长？！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Davy jones' locker couldn't stop me, wha' makes ye reckon ye can!?
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 戴维·琼斯都不能阻止我，你凭什么认为你能？！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Get out here 'n help yer cap'n!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 快出来帮帮你们的船长！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll nah be leavin' here alive!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 你不可能活着离开这里！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll ne'er scuttle me ye yellow-bellied cur!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 你永远也打不垮我，你这黄皮狗！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> I'll fight till me last breath!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 我将战斗到最后一口气！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> I've come closer t' death than this!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 我比这更接近死亡！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye'll freeze where ye stand!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 你将会冻僵在那里！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> The sea be mine t' freeze!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 大海将被我冻结！
§c<白霜之主> 小崽子们！用炮弹如暴雨般轰击他们！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Rip 'em apart, shoot the cannons!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 把他们撕成碎片，大炮发射！
§c<白霜之主> 倾泻所有炮火！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Me crystal will make quick work o' ye!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 我的水晶将很快砸向你们！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> See if ye can handle me crystal bomb ye wee scallywag!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 看看你能不能搞定我的水晶炸弹，你这个小混蛋！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Ye bore me! Hit 'em wit' the crystal bomb!
pairs.value: §c<白霜之主> 你让我厌烦了！用水晶炸弹打他们！

pairs.key: §4Kill Hoar Frost's summoned crystal before it explodes!
pairs.value: §4在白霜召唤的水晶炸弹爆炸前杀死它！
§c<钢铁守护者> 你竟敢挑战我？

pairs.key: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> The high throne will hear of this treason!
pairs.value: §c<钢铁守护者> 王庭会意识到这是背叛！

pairs.key: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> Fall to the throne's guard!
pairs.value: §c<Ferrous Wroughtnaut> Fall to the throne's guard!
§c<钢铁守护者> 我不会阵亡的！
§c<钢铁守护者> 王位给予我力量！
§c<焰魔> 死在我的剑刃下吧！
§c<焰魔> 尝尝真正的力量吧！
§c<焰魔> 趁你还能跑，赶紧跑吧！

pairs.key: §c<Ignis> I will shatter you from your core!
pairs.value: §c<焰魔> 我会把你从骨子里粉碎！
§c<焰魔> 你敢的话就再过来一点！
§c<下界合金巨兽> [战斗：检测到移动]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [战斗：敌人逼近]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [战斗：发现敌人]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [辅助：受到伤害]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [辅助：内部故障]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [紧急：即将停机]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [紧急：能量极低]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [紧急：检测到熔毁]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [核心：爆炸物置入]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [核心：燃烧转移]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [核心：注入成功]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [检查：距离过远]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [检查：距离过近]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [轰炸：锁定目标]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [轰炸：获取目标]
§c<下界合金巨兽> [轰炸：探查目标]

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE HIT ME??
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE HIT ME??

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> ME CRUSH TINY CREATURE!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> ME CRUSH TINY CREATURE!

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> ANT BITE ME HAHA!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> ANT BITE ME HAHA!

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> ME HATE TINY CREATURE!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> ME HATE TINY CREATURE!

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE GO UP!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> TINY CREATURE GO UP!
§c<大地傀儡> 你胆敢挑战我！？
§c<大地傀儡> 你什么都不是！

pairs.key: §c<Land Golem> I will not be killed so easily!
pairs.value: §c<大地傀儡> 我不会这么轻易的被杀死的！

pairs.key: §c<Land Golem> My minions will protect me!
pairs.value: §c<大地傀儡> 我的随从会保护我！

pairs.key: §c<Land Golem> Quit messing around, get them!
pairs.value: §c<大地傀儡> 别瞎搞了，抓住他们！

pairs.key: §c<Land Golem> This tower will not fall!
pairs.value: §c<大地傀儡> 这座塔不会倒塌！
§c<大地傀儡> 你的努力毫无意义！

pairs.key: §cThe boss enrages, and their scales harden!
pairs.value: §c首领被激怒了，它们的鳞片变得坚硬无比！

pairs.key: §cYou notice a command block floating high above the portal... it looks mineable?
pairs.value: §c你注意到一个命令方块高高悬浮在传送门之上……它看起来可以挖掉？

pairs.key: World difficulty has been reset back to day 0.
pairs.value: 世界难度已重置为第0天。

pairs.key: Use /slayertaskreset to get a new task.
§c<Infori> Oh look who joined... the creator of Infernal Origins.
pairs.value: §c<Infori> Oh look who joined... the creator of Infernal Origins.

pairs.key: §4was injected with a bomb! Get away from them!
pairs.value: §4was injected with a bomb! Get away from them!

pairs.key: §4You were hit by the bomb from
pairs.value: §4You were hit by the bomb from

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> Fair winds t' ye in Davy Jones' locker! Hahaha!
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> Fair winds t' ye in Davy Jones' locker! Hahaha!
§c<远古守卫者> 认清你的地位！
§c<大地傀儡> 这座塔仍矗立着。
§c<钢铁守护者> 你的弱小令我恶心！

pairs.key: §c<Hoar Frost> All o' that power... gone t' waste...
pairs.value: §c<Hoar Frost> All o' that power... gone t' waste...

pairs.key: §c<Ignis> YOU KNOW NOT OF WHAT YOU HAVE DONE!
pairs.value: §c<焰魔> 你根本就不知道你做了什么！！

pairs.key: §c<The Big One> NOOOOOOOOOO!! ME NO LOSE!
pairs.value: §c<The Big One> NOOOOOOOOOO!! ME NO LOSE!
§c<末影守卫> 虚空……夺走了我的灵魂……
§c<大地傀儡> 崩塌了……就像我一样……

pairs.key: §eYour healer consumes the elixir, increasing your health as well.
pairs.value: §e你们的医者饮用了一瓶灵药，你的生命值也得到了增加。

pairs.key: §eYou fish up a §5Mega Rare Treasure Crate§e!
pairs.value: §e你钓到了一个§5极其稀有宝藏板条箱§e！
§e你钓到了一个§b稀有宝藏板条箱§e！
§e你钓到了一个§f普通宝藏板条箱§e！

pairs.key: §eYou are currently experiencing a normal temperature.
§eYou are currently experiencing a moderate cold.
§cYour arms grow weary with Mining Fatigue 4...
pairs.value: §c你的手臂由于挖掘疲劳4而变得疲惫不堪……

pairs.key: §cEvery 6 seconds you have a 33% chance to become frozen for 2 seconds.
§eYou consume the elixir, increasing your armor by +0.5.
pairs.value: §e你饮用了一瓶灵药，你的盔甲值增加了0.5。

pairs.key: §eYou consume the elixir, increasing your health.
pairs.value: §e你饮用了一瓶灵药，你的生命值增加了。

pairs.key: §eYou consume the elixir, increasing your luck by +0.25.
pairs.value: §e你饮用了一瓶灵药，你的幸运值增加了0.25。

pairs.key: §eYou consume the elixir, increasing your speed by +0.0025.
pairs.value: §e你饮用了一瓶灵药，你的速度增加了0.0025。

pairs.key: §7Attacking burning entities deals 100% additional AOE fire damage to all entities within an 8 block range.
pairs.value: §7攻击燃烧的实体可对周围8格内的所有实体造成100%的额外AOE火焰伤害。

pairs.key: §7Deal +50% additional physical damage per empty armor slot.
pairs.value: §7Deal +50% additional physical damage per empty armor slot.

pairs.key: §7Kills apply Strength for 30 seconds to all players within 15 blocks. Effect stacks with additional kills, capping at level 30. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7击杀可对周围15格内的所有玩家施加30秒的力量效果。效果可以叠加，至多叠至30级。只有击杀怪物实体可以触发。

pairs.key: §7Kills apply Regeneration for 30 seconds to all players within 15 blocks. Effect stacks with additional kills, capping at level 30. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7击杀可对周围15格内的所有玩家施加30秒的生命恢复效果。效果可以叠加，至多叠至30级。只有击杀怪物实体可以触发。

pairs.key: §7Attacking entities with at least 90% health deals 4x additional physical damage.
pairs.value: §7攻击生命值在90%以上的实体可造成4x额外的物理伤害。

pairs.key: §7Deal additional magic damage based on your current Slayer Task streak.
pairs.value: §7基于你现在的杀手任务连胜数造成额外的魔法伤害。

pairs.key: §7Kills apply Wither 10 for 5 seconds to all entities within 8 blocks.
pairs.value: §7击杀可对周围8格内的所有实体施加5秒的凋零10效果。

pairs.key: §7Kills have a 20% chance to summon a friendly Vindicator to attack nearby entities for 30 seconds. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7击杀有20%的概率召唤一个友好的卫道士攻击附近的实体，持续30秒。只有击杀怪物实体可以触发。

pairs.key: §7Deal 3x additional damage to bosses. Damage dealt is typeless and pierces defence.
pairs.value: §7对首领造成3x无类型且穿透防御的额外伤害。

pairs.key: §7Taking critical damage while holding this item will save your location. Upon dying, you'll be teleported back to where the critical damage was received. Will only work in the Overworld.
pairs.value: §7Taking critical damage while holding this item will save your location. Upon dying, you'll be teleported back to where the critical damage was received. Will only work in the Overworld.

pairs.key: §7Kills enhance your defence, causing you to gain a random amount of armor for 1 minute. Armor received varies between 6 and 24. Value rerolls on additional kills and will remove on death.
pairs.value: §7Kills enhance your defence, causing you to gain a random amount of armor for 1 minute. Armor received varies between 6 and 24. Value rerolls on additional kills and will remove on death.

pairs.key: §7Dodging an attack from the Dodge skill will cause you to heal the amount you would have taken. Healing received is fixed and cannot be amplified.
pairs.value: §7使用躲避技能躲避一次攻击，则该攻击本应造成的伤害会转变为等血量的治疗。治疗的量是固定的，无法被放大。

pairs.key: §7Kills have a 5% chance to grant skill points based on your current Slayer Task streak x 5. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7击杀有5%的概率获得当前杀手任务连胜数x5点的技能点。只有击杀怪物实体可以触发。

pairs.key: §7Your Health Regeneration skill heals twice as fast while this item is held.
pairs.value: §7手持此物品时，你的生命恢复技能的治疗速度翻倍。

pairs.key: §cYou cannot add the same rune to one item.
pairs.value: §c你不能在一个物品上添加相同的符文。

pairs.key: §cYou cannot add more than 3 runes to one item.
pairs.value: §c你不能在一个物品上添加3个以上的符文。

pairs.key: §eAll runes have been removed from this item.
pairs.value: §e此物品上的所有符文已被移除。

pairs.key: §cThere are no runes to remove from this item.
pairs.value: §c此物品上已无可移除的符文。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Deal additional magic damage based on your current Slayer Task streak.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：基于你现在的杀手任务连胜数造成额外的魔法伤害。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Kills apply Wither 10 for 5 seconds to all entities within 8 blocks.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：击杀可对周围8格内的所有实体施加5秒的凋零10效果。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Deal 3x additional damage to bosses. Damage dealt is typeless and pierces defence.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：对首领造成3x无类型且穿透防御的额外伤害。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Taking critical damage while holding this item will save your location. Upon dying, you'll be teleported back to where the critical damage was received. Will only work in the Overworld.
pairs.value: §7- Effect: Taking critical damage while holding this item will save your location. Upon dying, you'll be teleported back to where the critical damage was received. Will only work in the Overworld.

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Kills enhance your defence, causing you to gain a random amount of armor for 1 minute. Armor received varies between 6 and 24. Value rerolls on additional kills and will remove on death.
pairs.value: §7- Effect: Kills enhance your defence, causing you to gain a random amount of armor for 1 minute. Armor received varies between 6 and 24. Value rerolls on additional kills and will remove on death.

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Dodging an attack from the Dodge skill will cause you to heal the amount you would have taken. Healing received is fixed and cannot be amplified.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：使用躲避技能躲避一次攻击，则该攻击本应造成的伤害会转变为等血量的治疗。治疗的量是固定的，无法被放大。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Kills have a 5% chance to grant skill points based on your current Slayer Task streak x 5. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：击杀有5%的概率获得当前杀手任务连胜数x5点的技能点。只有击杀怪物实体可以触发。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Your Health Regeneration skill heals twice as fast while this item is held.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：手持此物品时，你的生命恢复技能的治疗速度翻倍。

pairs.key: §7- Effect: Kills have a 20% chance to summon a friendly Vindicator to attack nearby entities for 30 seconds. Can only proc from monster entities.
pairs.value: §7- 效果：击杀有20%的概率召唤一个友好的卫道士攻击附近的实体，持续30秒。只有击杀怪物实体可以触发。

pairs.key: You open the bag and claim its rewards!
pairs.value: 你打开袋子并领取了奖励！

pairs.key: §cIf playing on LAN or Essential servers, you may experience constant kicks on §eOwlkin §cand §eVoid Wyvern§c. Other Origins may experience kicks, but not as often. If you're playing on dedicated, these kicks will not occur and you can ignore this.
pairs.value: §cIf playing on LAN or Essential servers, you may experience constant kicks on §eOwlkin §cand §eVoid Wyvern§c. Other Origins may experience kicks, but not as often. If you're playing on dedicated, these kicks will not occur and you can ignore this.
